page.title: 07POLICING THE AREA
page.content: The area is served by a small police station situated on Main Street,East Leake.It is only open at certain times of the week and may close in the future.When the station is not manned,calls have to be made to West Bridgford,some ten miles away. The local police report that there is little crime in the area,the main problem being the large number of teenagers,living mainly in East Leake. The police work on a shift system,each shift lasting five hours. Great efforts have been made to build good relationships between the police and the community.This is particularly so in the case of children.Regular visits are made to schools at which the subjects of the danger of going with strangers,the work of the police etc.are discussed.
